TaxonIdentification.subspecies_authority: J. E. Keeley, L. Boykin & Massihi

treatment.description: Plants, erect, 1–2 m; burl present. Leaf blades bright green, shiny. 2n = 52.
treatment.discussion: Subspecies tumescens is found in the eastern part of the Transverse Ranges in the eastern San Bernardino Mountains, San Bernardino County.
